docs.title: KMP Test Bench
docs.text:
A modular tool for debugging Kotlin Multiplatform applications.

Documentation

Getting Started

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Include the Desktop application plugin in your root build.gradle.kts:

plugins {
  id("build.wallet.kmp-test-bench") version "1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
}

testbench {
  // ...
}

(optional) Add Custom bench plugins in settings.gradle.kts

plugins {
  id("build.wallet.kmp-test-bench-settings") version "1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
}

testbench {
  includePlugin(":plugins:logs")
  includePlugin(":plugins:databases")
  includePlugin(":plugins:preferences")
  includePlugin(":plugins:network") {
      clientVariations("ktor", "okhttp", "platform")
  }
}
